Here's your personalized Jim Corbett weekend itinerary from Delhi for 2 people on a total budget of ‚Çπ30,000!

## Jim Corbett Weekend Adventure (2 days, 1 night)

### Day 1: Delhi ‚Üí Jim Corbett & Jungle Exploration

#### Morning
‚Ä¢ **Depart from Delhi**
  - Early start: Leave around 5:00 am by private car or AC bus
  - Duration: 5-6 hours drive (260 km)
  - Cost: ‚Çπ3,000-4,000 (shared AC cab/Intercity bus for 2)
  - > Tip: A private taxi is more comfortable; Volvo buses available from Anand Vihar ISBT

‚Ä¢ **Check-in at Resort/Hotel**
  - Budget stay: ‚Çπ2,500-3,500 per night (for 2), includes basic breakfast
  - > Recommendation: Corbett Jungle Lore, Corbett View Resort

#### Afternoon
‚Ä¢ **Lunch & Relaxation** üçΩÔ∏è
  - Budget: ‚Çπ700-1,000 for two (local dhaba or resort restaurant)
  - > Tip: Try Kumaoni cuisine

‚Ä¢ **Jungle Safari (Bijrani/Jhirna/Sitabani Zone)**
  - Jeep safari: 3 hours
  - Cost: ‚Çπ4,200-4,500 per jeep (max 6) ‚Äì split cost if open to joining others, else pay full
  - Safari timings: 1:00‚Äì4:30 pm (Exact slots depend on zone)
  - > Includes govt. guide, permit, and jeep
  - > Booking: Needed at least 1-2 weeks in advance (esp. weekends)
  - > Tip: Carry government ID for all participants

#### Evening
‚Ä¢ **Campfire & Nature Walk**
  - Most resorts feature a small bonfire or local music (included in stay or around ‚Çπ500/couple)
  - Duration: 2 hours
  - > Tip: Enjoy local snacks, stargazing

> **Getting Around:** All major resorts arrange transfers to safari gate. Autos/local cabs: ‚Çπ200-300/trip

> **Dining:** Dinner at resort or local eatery ‚Äì ‚Çπ800-1,200 for two. Try river-side cafes if available.

> **Rainy Day:** Resort indoor activities (board games, cultural shows)

---

### Day 2: River Walk, Village Life & Return

#### Morning
‚Ä¢ **Nature Walk along Kosi or Ramganga River**
  - Leisurely guided stroll, bird-watching
  - Duration: 1-2 hours
  - Cost: ‚Çπ300-500 per person (guided)
  - > Tip: Watch for kingfishers, deer, and sometimes elephants near banks

‚Ä¢ **Breakfast at Resort**
  - Usually included in room cost

#### Afternoon
‚Ä¢ **Village Visit or Garjia Temple**
  - Visit Garjia Devi temple on riverbed or nearby Corbett villages
  - Duration: 1-2 hours
  - Transport: ‚Çπ300-600 round trip by auto/local cab
  - > Tip: Light trekking shoes helpful for the temple

‚Ä¢ **Lunch & Check-out**
  - Lunch at local caf√© or resort: ‚Çπ800-1,000 for two
  - Check-out by noon

‚Ä¢ **Afternoon Return to Delhi**
  - Start post-lunch, reach by evening 7-8 pm
  - Transport: ‚Çπ3,000-4,000 (taxi/Volvo bus)

---

## Budget Breakdown (for 2 people)
| Item                 | Cost (‚Çπ)   |
|----------------------|------------|
| Transport (Delhi <-> Corbett) | 6,000-8,000 |
| Resort Stay (1 night)         | 3,000       |
| Jungle Safari (1 jeep)        | 4,500       |
| Meals (2 lunches, 1 dinner)   | 3,000-4,000 |
| Activities (walk, bonfire)    | 1,000       |
| Local transport/village visit | 1,000       |
| Misc./buffer                  | 1,500       |
| **Total**                     | **~‚Çπ20,500‚Äì23,500** |

(Plenty of buffer for shopping/souvenirs or a premium meal!)

---

## Essential Tips

- Book safari and accommodation as early as possible, especially on weekends.
- Carry original government IDs for safari booking.
- Dress: Neutral colors for safari, packed shoes/hats, mosquito repellent.
- Connectivity is patchy in forest zones; major resorts have Wi-Fi.
- Prefer cash for local cafes/temples.
- Best time for wildlife: Early morning/late afternoon safari slots.
- Follow all instructions given by guides for safety.

---

### Pre-Trip Checklist

- Valid photo ID (Aadhaar/Passport/Driving License)
- Sunscreen, hat, sunglasses
- Binoculars for bird-watching
- Camera with extra batteries
- Small first-aid kit
- A light jacket (mornings/evenings can be cool, especially Nov-Feb)

---

üí° **Travel Essentials:** Check visa requirements for Uttarakhand (not needed for Indian citizens, but required for foreign passport holders). Apply 2-3 weeks before departure if required.

Have an adventurous and safe trip to Jim Corbett! For bookings of flights/buses/hotels and safari permits, visit cheapoair.com. If you'd like a 3-day or custom plan, just let me know! üêÖüåø
